page.title: 20GHOSTS
page.content: IN AN OLD BOOK THERE IS A STORY ABOUT AN OLD MAN WHO CARRIES HIS HEAD UNDER HIS ARM AND IF ANYONE GOES DOWN BY SALDEN POND ON A VERY DARK NIGHT HE WILL FOLLOW HIM TO A CERTAIN POINT DOWN THE LANE AND IF ANYONE FOLLOWS HIM HE IS SUPPOSED TO LEAD THEM TO A POT OF GOLD.THE GHOST IS DRESSED IN AN OLD FASHIONED UNIFORM AND IS SUPPOSED TO BE A SOLDIER FROM THE WARS OF THE ROSES WHICH WERE FOUGHT AT SALDEN. THERE IS ALSO A STORY ABOUT SOME COACHES FILLED WITH FUNNY PEOPLE GOING LIKE A WHIRLWIND THROUGH SALDEN WOOD "CLUTTERING" UP STONES AND DUST.WE ASKED THE PRESENT OWNER IF SHE HAS EVER SEEN THESE THINGS BUT SHE SAID SHE NEVER HAS ALTHOUGH SHE OFTEN GETS A FEELING WHEN SHE WALKS IN A CERTAIN FIELD,THIS IS NOT A FRIGHTENING EXPERIENCE THOUGH.
